issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.description:
Tez compiler has the ability to push JOIN within UNION (by replicating join on each branch). If this JOIN had a SJ branch outgoing (or incoming) it could mess up the plan and end up generating incorrect or wrong plan.
As a safe measure any SJ branch after UNION should be removed (until we improve the logic to better handle SJ branches)
fields.summary: Semi join + Union can lead to wrong plans
